stem.name: amount
stem.definition: a quantity of something such as time, money, food, etc.

stem.name: Augustus
stem.definition: the emperor of Rome at the time of Jesus

stem.name: baby
stem.definition: a baby animal, as opposed to a baby human

stem.name: back

stem.name: bamboo
stem.definition: wood from a bamboo tree (The cage was made of bamboo.)

stem.definition: strip of cloth or other material meant to cover a wound to keep it clean

stem.name: bank

stem.name: barn
stem.definition: a building for storing harvested crops

stem.name: battle
stem.definition: a battle, as opposed to a war

stem.name: bill

stem.name: birthday
stem.definition: anniversary of the day when someone was born

stem.name: blood

stem.name: board
stem.definition: a cutting board used when cutting meat or food

stem.definition: husband of Rahab, husband of Ruth

stem.name: body

stem.name: boss

stem.name: bow
stem.definition: the weapon used to shoot arrows

stem.name: brother
